short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create mobile applications and websites with ease.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AppNotch - the Easiest and Fastest way to Create Your Android and iOS Native App.  
   
Simply enter your website URL and configure your Google Play and iTunes App Store images and metadata. 
 
Anytime You Change Your Website, Your App Updates Itself. No Need to Re-Deploy to App Store.
